channel.title: Steven Masini
channel.description: Enthusiastic software engineer with 12+ years in iOS development and a Master’s degree in Computer Science from EPITECH. I’ve released over 15 apps on the App Store, specializing in crafting clean, bug-free mobile solutions with Objective-C and Swift. My focus includes UI/UX, and I’m adept with tools like Photoshop, Sketch, and Glyphs. Open to collaboration and always aiming for growth, I value high-quality code and user-centered design.

item.title: Strong Workout Tracker Gym Log
item.description: Fitness tracking app with customizable themes, icons, and advanced debugging tools
item.content:encoded:
Strong Workout Tracker Gym Log

As a freelance developer, I contributed to Strong Workout Tracker, one of the most popular fitness apps on the App Store.

Key Contributions

Aesthetic Features

  • Developed customizable themes and app icons
  • Enhanced user interface for better visual appeal
  • Implemented personalization options

Advanced Debugging Tools

  • Built on-the-fly user account type editor for testing
  • Created test data generator (thousands of records)
  • Developed local database diagnostic tools

Compliance & Maintenance

  • Updated the app for GDPR compliance
  • Implemented Apple Nutrition Label requirements
  • Bug fixes, crash resolution, and technical support

Technologies Used

Swift, UIKit, HealthKit, Core Data, GDPR Compliance

Impact

Strong is trusted by millions of users worldwide for tracking their workouts and fitness progress, helping people achieve their health goals.

item.title: Programming Languages
item.description: Programming languages I use to build robust, maintainable software
item.content:encoded:
Programming Languages

Expert Level

Swift

My primary language for modern iOS development. I've been using Swift since its early days and have deep expertise in:

  • SwiftUI and UIKit
  • Protocol-oriented programming
  • Generics and type safety
  • Async/await concurrency
  • Memory management and performance optimization

Objective-C

Foundation of my iOS career with 12+ years of experience. Comfortable with:

  • Manual memory management (MRC and ARC)
  • Runtime features and dynamic messaging
  • C integration
  • Legacy codebase maintenance and modernization

Proficient

JavaScript/TypeScript

Used extensively for:

  • React Native development
  • Node.js backend services
  • Full-stack mobile solutions

C++

Learned through EPITECH's rigorous curriculum, with experience in:

  • Object-oriented design patterns
  • Systems programming
  • Performance-critical code

C#/.NET

Experience from Windows development and enterprise projects

PHP

Web development and backend services using Zend Framework

C

Foundation of EPITECH training, understanding low-level programming and UNIX systems

Languages Span

From low-level systems programming (C) to modern high-level development (Swift), I adapt to the right tool for each project.

item.title: Frameworks & Libraries
item.description: Frameworks and libraries I leverage for building mobile and backend applications
item.content:encoded:
Frameworks & Libraries

iOS Frameworks

UIKit (Expert)

Extensive experience building complex user interfaces:

  • Custom UI components
  • Auto Layout and programmatic layouts
  • Animation and transitions
  • Table and collection views
  • Navigation patterns

SwiftUI (Proficient)

Modern declarative UI development:

  • Reactive programming
  • State management
  • Cross-platform iOS/macOS development

Core Frameworks

  • HealthKit: Fitness and health data integration
  • Core Data: Local database management
  • Core Animation: Advanced animations
  • Push Notifications: Remote and local notifications
  • Networking: URLSession, modern async APIs

Cross-Platform

React Native (Expert)

Built complete cross-platform apps:

  • Native module development (Objective-C bridges)
  • Performance optimization
  • Platform-specific implementations
  • Complex UI with Flexbox
  • WebSocket integration

Backend

Node.js (Proficient)

Full-stack development capabilities:

  • RESTful API development
  • Real-time communication (WebSockets)
  • Database integration
  • Authentication and authorization

Developer Tools

CocoaPods

Dependency management and modular architecture

Fastlane

CI/CD automation, deployment pipelines

Git

Version control, branching strategies, collaborative development

item.title: Methodologies & Architecture
item.description: Software architecture patterns and development methodologies I practice
item.content:encoded:
Methodologies & Architecture

Design Patterns

Model-View-Controller (MVC)

Classic iOS architecture pattern with deep understanding of:

  • Separation of concerns
  • Controller responsibilities
  • Data flow management
  • Appropriate use cases

Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM)

Modern architecture for reactive applications:

  • Data binding
  • Testability improvements
  • Clear separation of UI and business logic
  • Dependency injection

Functional Programming

Leveraging functional concepts in Swift:

  • Immutability
  • Pure functions
  • Higher-order functions (map, filter, reduce)
  • Error handling with Result types

Development Practices

Code Quality

Zero tolerance for:

  • Bugs in production
  • Code duplication
  • Poor code quality
  • Technical debt

Continuous Practices

  • Continuous Delivery: Automated deployment pipelines with Fastlane and Jenkins
  • Code Review: Collaborative development and knowledge sharing
  • Refactoring: Regular improvement of existing code
  • Performance Optimization: Profiling and optimization (reduced build times from 70 min to 11 min)

Testing

  • Unit testing critical business logic
  • Debug tools and diagnostic systems
  • Test data generation for QA

Project Management

  • Agile Development: Iterative development with regular releases
  • Release Planning: Bi-weekly to monthly release cycles
  • Team Leadership: Task allocation and sprint planning
  • ASO: App Store Optimization strategies

Principles

Following SOLID principles and Clean Code practices to create maintainable, scalable, and robust software that stands the test of time.

item.title: Development Tools & Design
item.description: Development tools and design software I use daily
item.content:encoded:
Development Tools & Design

Development Environments

Xcode

Daily driver for iOS development:

  • Interface Builder and Storyboards
  • Instruments for profiling
  • Debugging and LLDB
  • Source control integration
  • Build configuration and schemes

Visual Studio Code

For web development, Node.js, and scripting

Command Line Tools

Proficient with UNIX/Linux command line, shell scripting, and automation

UI/UX Design Tools

Photoshop

Professional image editing and design:

  • App icon creation
  • Asset preparation
  • Image optimization
  • UI mockups

Sketch

Modern interface design:

  • App screen design
  • Prototyping
  • Design system creation
  • Asset export for developers

Glyphs

Custom icon and font creation:

  • Vector graphics
  • Icon design
  • Font editing

Version Control & CI/CD

Git

Advanced version control:

  • Branching strategies (Git Flow, GitHub Flow)
  • Merge conflict resolution
  • Collaborative workflows
  • Repository management

Fastlane

iOS deployment automation:

  • Automated builds
  • Screenshot generation
  • App Store deployment
  • Beta distribution (TestFlight)

Jenkins

Continuous integration setup and management

Package Managers

  • CocoaPods: iOS dependency management
  • npm: Node.js packages
  • Homebrew: macOS package management

Project Management

  • JIRA: Agile project tracking
  • GitHub/GitLab: Code hosting and collaboration
  • Slack: Team communication

Design Philosophy

I believe developers should understand design, and designers should understand development. My proficiency with design tools allows me to:

  • Bridge the gap between design and implementation
  • Create my own assets when needed
  • Better communicate with designers
  • Make informed UI/UX decisions

This combination of technical and design skills enables me to deliver polished, user-friendly applications from concept to completion.

item.title: Freelance iOS & Node.js Developer
item.description: iOS and Node.js development for fitness and lifestyle applications
item.content:encoded:
Freelance iOS & Node.js Developer

Since December 2019, I've been working as an independent developer, collaborating with clients worldwide on iOS and backend Node.js projects.

Current Focus

Specializing in:

  • Native iOS development with Swift
  • Backend services with Node.js
  • Full-stack mobile solutions
  • UI/UX implementation

Key Project: Strong Workout Tracker

Working on one of the most popular fitness tracking apps on the App Store:

  • Developed customizable themes and app icons
  • Built advanced debugging tools for development team
  • Implemented GDPR and Apple Nutrition Label compliance
  • Ongoing maintenance, bug fixes, and feature development

Approach

As a freelancer, I maintain the same high standards I've always held: clean code, no bugs, and exceptional user experience. I work closely with clients to understand their needs and deliver solutions that exceed expectations.

item.title: SELECT - Your Community
item.description: Social community app built with React Native, featuring multi-friend selector and custom intro screens
item.content:encoded:
SELECT - Your Community

A cross-platform social community application that connects people with shared interests. I worked on SELECT during my time at Super Effective, contributing to both the native iOS version and the complete React Native rewrite.

Initial iOS Version (v1.32-1.37)

Performance Optimization

  • Reduced compilation time from 70 minutes to 11 minutes
  • Modularized codebase using CocoaPods
  • Refactored architecture to MVVM with Dependency Injection

DevOps

  • Configured Continuous Delivery environment using Fastlane with Jenkins
  • Streamlined deployment process

React Native Rewrite (v1.38+)

Core Features

  • WebSocket Communication Protocol: Defined and implemented client/server protocol
  • Multi Friend Selector (MFS): Intelligent contact search and suggestion system
  • Custom Intro Screens: Deep-link activated custom launch screens
  • Native Image Picker: Built Objective-C module with React Native bridge for optimal performance

UI Implementation

  • Responsible for most screen layouts using Flexbox
  • Smooth, responsive design across iOS and Android

Technologies Used

React Native, Swift 3.0, Objective-C, WebSocket, Flexbox, Fastlane, Jenkins

Platform

Available on both iOS and Android

item.title: Super Effective - Mobile Developer
item.description: iOS and React Native development for social community platform
item.content:encoded:
Super Effective - Mobile Developer

Worked on SELECT - Your Community, a social platform app, contributing to both native iOS development and a complete React Native rewrite.

Native iOS Phase (v1.32-1.37)

Performance Improvements

  • Reduced build time from 70 minutes to 11 minutes
  • Modularized codebase using CocoaPods
  • Implemented MVVM architecture with Dependency Injection

DevOps

  • Configured Continuous Delivery with Fastlane and Jenkins
  • Streamlined release process

React Native Rewrite (v1.38+)

Core Development

  • Designed and implemented WebSocket communication protocol
  • Built Multi Friend Selector with intelligent contact search
  • Created custom intro-screen system with Deep Link support
  • Developed native Image Picker module in Objective-C with React Native bridge

UI Leadership

  • Responsible for majority of app screens using Flexbox layout
  • Cross-platform iOS and Android development

Technologies

Swift 3.0, Objective-C, React Native, JavaScript, WebSocket, Fastlane, Jenkins, CocoaPods

Impact

Successfully transformed a complex native iOS app into a modern, cross-platform solution while improving performance and maintainability.

item.title: CURIO EYE for WeChat Official
item.description: WeChat official account companion app for content creators and marketers
item.content:encoded:
CURIO EYE for WeChat Official

Built from the ground up at CuriosityChina (A Farfetch Company), CURIO EYE is a companion app for WeChat Official Account managers.

Full Ownership

As the sole iOS developer on this project, I was responsible for:

  • Complete app development: Source code, resources, and architecture
  • App Store Optimization (ASO): Managed app store presence and keywords
  • Release Management: Bi-weekly release cycle planning and execution
  • Product Direction: Contributed to product decision-making
  • Bundle Optimization: Minimized app size and resource footprint

Technical Achievement

Wrote the entire application from scratch (v1.0 to v1.1.5), maintaining high code quality standards and delivering regular updates to meet business needs.

Technologies Used

Swift, UIKit, WeChat API, iOS SDK

Impact

Helped content creators and marketers manage their WeChat Official Accounts more effectively through native iOS features and intuitive interface design.

item.title: CuriosityChina - iOS Mobile Developer
item.description: Complete iOS development ownership for WeChat Official Account management app
item.content:encoded:
CuriosityChina - iOS Mobile Developer

Joined CuriosityChina (later acquired by Farfetch) to build CURIO EYE, a companion app for WeChat Official Account managers.

Complete Ownership

As the sole iOS developer:

  • Wrote the entire application from scratch (v1.0 to v1.1.5)
  • Owned all source code, resources, and architecture decisions
  • Managed bi-weekly release cycles
  • Handled App Store Optimization
  • Contributed to product roadmap and decisions

Technical Excellence

  • Optimized app bundle size and resource usage
  • Maintained high code quality throughout rapid iteration
  • Delivered reliable updates every two weeks

Technologies

Swift, UIKit, WeChat API, iOS SDK

Achievement

Successfully built and maintained a complete iOS application independently while contributing to product strategy in a fast-paced startup environment.

item.title: Talkmate - Language Learning
item.description: Language learning app connecting students with native speakers worldwide
item.content:encoded:
Talkmate - Language Learning

Led the iOS development of Talkmate, a language learning platform that connects students with native speakers for conversation practice.

Leadership Role

As Lead iOS Developer at Beijing 200H Education:

  • Complete Rewrite: Inherited a project in development for over a year and completely rewrote the codebase
  • Team Leadership: Managed a team of 3-4 developers
  • Architecture: Re-architected the entire project for better maintainability
  • Resource Optimization: Optimized resources and reduced bundle size
  • Task Management: Allocated tasks and planned version releases
  • ASO Management: Handled App Store Optimization
  • Product Direction: Participated in product decision-making

Technical Transformation

Took over an existing codebase that needed significant improvements and delivered a polished, maintainable application (v1.0 to v2.1) that served the language learning community.

Technologies Used

Swift, UIKit, Real-time Communication, iOS SDK

Impact

Helped language learners worldwide improve their conversation skills by connecting them with native speakers in real-time.

item.title: Beijing 200H Education - Lead iOS Developer
item.description: Led iOS development team for language learning platform
item.content:encoded:
Beijing 200H Education - Lead iOS Developer

Led the iOS development of Talkmate, a language learning app connecting students with native speakers worldwide.

Leadership Responsibilities

  • Team Management: Led a team of 3-4 iOS developers
  • Task Allocation: Distributed work and set priorities
  • Release Planning: Managed version release schedule
  • Architecture Decisions: Made technical and architectural choices

Technical Leadership

Major Refactoring

  • Inherited a project in development for over a year
  • Completely rewrote the entire codebase
  • Re-architected for better scalability and maintainability

Optimization

  • Reduced bundle size through resource optimization
  • Improved app performance

Product Involvement

  • App Store Optimization (ASO)
  • Product direction and decision-making

Version Delivery

Successfully shipped versions 1.0 through 2.1, transforming a struggling project into a polished product.

Technologies

Swift, UIKit, Real-time Communication, iOS SDK

Growth

This role marked my transition into technical leadership, combining hands-on development with team management and strategic planning.

item.title: Corse Matin per noï
item.description: Digital newspaper reader with enriched PDF viewing for Corse Matin press agency
item.content:encoded:
Corse Matin per noï

A digital newspaper reader for the Corse Matin press agency, providing enriched PDF viewing of daily and weekly publications.

Key Features

  • MiLibris API Integration: Integrated v3 and v4 of the MiLibris API for enriched PDF viewing
  • iPad Version: Designed and developed the iPad-optimized version
  • Long-term Compatibility: Built for iOS 4.3+, still functional on iOS 11 without major updates

Technical Achievement

Created a robust, future-proof application that continued to work across multiple iOS versions without requiring significant updates, demonstrating solid architecture and forward-thinking development.

Technologies Used

Objective-C, MiLibris API v3/v4, iOS SDK

Platform

Universal app for iPhone and iPad

item.title: Le Trot - Cheval Français
item.description: Horse racing information app with push notifications for Le Trot - Cheval Français
item.content:encoded:
Le Trot - Cheval Français

Rewrote the horse racing information app for Le Trot, France's harness racing authority.

Key Contributions

  • Complete Rewrite: Rewrote source code for both iPhone and iPad versions
  • iOS 5+ Compatibility: Made the app compatible with iOS 5 and later versions
  • Push Notifications: Fixed critical push notification issues

Technologies Used

Objective-C, Apple Push Notification Service, iOS SDK

Impact

Provided French harness racing enthusiasts with reliable, real-time information about races, results, and news.

item.title: userADgents - iOS Mobile Developer
item.description: iOS development for diverse client projects across multiple industries
item.content:encoded:
userADgents - iOS Mobile Developer

Worked on multiple client projects across various industries, developing iOS applications for iPhone and iPad.

Featured Projects

Corse Matin per noï (v1.0-1.2)

  • Integrated MiLibris API v3 and v4 for enriched PDF viewing
  • Designed and developed iPad version for press agency
  • Built for iOS 4.3+ with remarkable longevity (still worked on iOS 11)

Le Trot - Cheval Français (v1.1)

  • Ensured iOS 5+ compatibility
  • Fixed push notification issues

myPMU - Horse Racing Info (v1.0)

  • Team member (3 developers)
  • UI implementation
  • Core Data database support

Belles Demeures - Real Estate (v1.0)

  • Team member (3 developers)
  • Full iPhone and iPad development
  • UI integration

FFB - Déchets BTP

  • iOS 7 and Windows Phone 8 development
  • API integration
  • Navigation and UI implementation
  • Core Data cache management

Technologies

Objective-C, Core Data, Push Notifications, MiLibris API, iOS SDK

Professional Growth

This role established my foundation in professional iOS development, working with diverse teams on varied projects across multiple industries.

item.title: C4M Prod - Developer
item.description: Multi-platform development including Android, Web, and Windows C#
item.content:encoded:
C4M Prod - Developer

Third-year internship focusing on multi-platform development across Android, Web, and Windows.

Android Development

RATP (Paris Transit)

  • Updated internal database
  • Integrated AdMob advertising framework

Qobuz (Music Streaming)

  • Developed music player interface
  • Created artist information section with custom display
  • Implemented social sharing (Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email) for tracks and playlists

Web Development

Web Services Maintenance (Zend Framework)

  • Atol les opticiens
  • Volkswagen
  • Digitick

Pushmii Server

  • Server maintenance
  • Created PHP client library for deployment automation
  • Simplified push notification sending

Windows C# Development

Daiichi-Sankyo

  • Created HTML template generator for e-ADV application
  • Microsoft C# and .NET 4.0
  • Excel data extraction and formatting

Technologies

Java (Android), PHP (Zend Framework), C# (.NET 4.0), AdMob, Social APIs

Foundation

This internship provided valuable exposure to multiple platforms and technologies, broadening my development perspective beyond mobile.

item.title: Technivore - Web Frontend Developer
item.description: Web frontend development with CMS platforms
item.content:encoded:
Technivore - Web Frontend Developer

First-year internship focusing on web frontend development and CMS management.

Projects

Association Pacamômes

  • Upgraded Joomla CMS from 1.0 to 1.5
  • Database migration
  • Improved partner visibility in search results
  • Enhanced visual design with CSS 3 and JavaScript

Programme SIRS

  • Created website without CMS
  • Hand-coded XHTML/CSS2

Faire du sport à Marseille

  • Site maintenance
  • SPIP CMS management

Technologies

HTML/XHTML, CSS2/CSS3, JavaScript, Joomla, SPIP, PHP

Learning Experience

My first professional experience, this internship introduced me to web development best practices and CMS platforms, forming the foundation of my software development career.
